blocks.name: cass
blocks.content: Extend class notation with a device to add associativity to internal operations.

blocks.name: df-ass
blocks.content: A device to add associativity to various sorts of internal operations. The definition is meaningful when ` g ` is a magma at least. (Contributed by FL, 1-Nov-2009.) (New usage is discouraged.)
blocks.origin:
axiom df-ass(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3) {
  |- wceq(cass, cab(s0, wral(s1, cdm(cdm(cv(s0))), wral(s2, cdm(cdm(cv(s0))), wral(s3, cdm(cdm(cv(s0))), wceq(co(co(cv(s1), cv(s0), cv(s2)), cv(s0), cv(s3)), co(cv(s1), cv(s0), co(cv(s2), cv(s0), cv(s3)))))))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s0, s3)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s3)
  -| diffss(s2, s3)
}

blocks.name: cexid
blocks.content: Extend class notation with the class of all the internal operations with an identity element.

blocks.name: df-exid
blocks.content: A device to add an identity element to various sorts of internal operations. (Contributed by FL, 2-Nov-2009.) (New usage is discouraged.)

blocks.name: isass
blocks.content: The predicate "is an associative operation". (Contributed by FL, 1-Nov-2009.) (New usage is discouraged.)
blocks.origin:
thm isass(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, c1), wb(wcel(c0, cass), wral(s0, c2, wral(s1, c2, wral(s2, c2, wceq(co(co(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)), c0, cv(s2)), co(cv(s0), c0, co(cv(s1), c0, cv(s2)))))))))
  -| wceq(c2, cdm(cdm(c0)))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
  -| diffsc(s2, c0)
  -| diffsc(s2, c2)
} = {
  a1ii(wi(wcel(c0, c1), wb(wcel(c0, cass), wral(s0, c2, wral(s1, c2, wral(s2, c2, wceq(co(co(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)), c0, cv(s2)), co(cv(s0), c0, co(cv(s1), c0, cv(s2))))))))), diffsc(s0, c2))
  elab2g(hs0, c0, c1, cass, wral(s0, c2, wral(s1, c2, wral(s2, c2, wceq(co(co(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)), c0, cv(s2)), co(cv(s0), c0, co(cv(s1), c0, cv(s2))))))), wral(s0, cdm(cdm(cv(hs0))), wral(s1, cdm(cdm(cv(hs0))), wral(s2, cdm(cdm(cv(hs0))), wceq(co(co(cv(s0), cv(hs0), cv(s1)), cv(hs0), cv(s2)), co(cv(s0), cv(hs0), co(cv(s1), cv(hs0), cv(s2))))))))
  3bitrd(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wral(s0, cdm(cdm(cv(hs0))), wral(s1, cdm(cdm(cv(hs0))), wral(s2, cdm(cdm(cv(hs0))), wceq(co(co(cv(s0), cv(hs0), cv(s1)), cv(hs0), cv(s2)), co(cv(s0), cv(hs0), co(cv(s1), cv(hs0), cv(s2))))))), wral(s0, c2, wral(s1, c2, wral(s2, c2, wceq(co(co(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)), c0, cv(s2)), co(cv(s0), c0, co(cv(s1), c0, cv(s2))))))), wral(s0, cdm(cdm(c0)), wral(s1, cdm(cdm(c0)), wral(s2, cdm(cdm(c0)), wceq(co(co(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)), c0, cv(s2)), co(cv(s0), c0, co(cv(s1), c0, cv(s2))))))), wral(s0, c2, wral(s1, c2, wral(s2, cdm(cdm(c0)), wceq(co(co(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)), c0, cv(s2)), co(cv(s0), c0, co(cv(s1), c0, cv(s2))))))))
  3bitr4g(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wral(s0, cdm(cdm(cv(hs0))), wral(s1, cdm(cdm(cv(hs0))), wral(s2, cdm(cdm(cv(hs0))), wceq(co(co(cv(s0), cv(hs0), cv(s1)), cv(hs0), cv(s2)), co(cv(s0), cv(hs0), co(cv(s1), cv(hs0), cv(s2))))))), wral(s0, cdm(cdm(c0)), wral(s1, cdm(cdm(c0)), wral(s2, cdm(cdm(c0)), wceq(co(co(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)), c0, cv(s2)), co(cv(s0), c0, co(cv(s1), c0, cv(s2))))))), wal(s0, wal(s1, wal(s2, wi(w3a(wcel(cv(s0), cdm(cdm(cv(hs0)))), wcel(cv(s1), cdm(cdm(cv(hs0)))), wcel(cv(s2), cdm(cdm(cv(hs0))))), wceq(co(co(cv(s0), cv(hs0), cv(s1)), cv(hs0), cv(s2)), co(cv(s0), cv(hs0), co(cv(s1), cv(hs0), cv(s2)))))))), wal(s0, wal(s1, wal(s2, wi(w3a(wcel(cv(s0), cdm(cdm(c0))), wcel(cv(s1), cdm(cdm(c0))), wcel(cv(s2), cdm(cdm(c0)))), wceq(co(co(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)), c0, cv(s2)), co(cv(s0), c0, co(cv(s1), c0, cv(s2)))))))))
  2albidv(s0, s1, wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wal(s2, wi(w3a(wcel(cv(s0), cdm(cdm(cv(hs0)))), wcel(cv(s1), cdm(cdm(cv(hs0)))), wcel(cv(s2), cdm(cdm(cv(hs0))))), wceq(co(co(cv(s0), cv(hs0), cv(s1)), cv(hs0), cv(s2)), co(cv(s0), cv(hs0), co(cv(s1), cv(hs0), cv(s2)))))), wal(s2, wi(w3a(wcel(cv(s0), cdm(cdm(c0))), wcel(cv(s1), cdm(cdm(c0))), wcel(cv(s2), cdm(cdm(c0)))), wceq(co(co(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)), c0, cv(s2)), co(cv(s0), c0, co(cv(s1), c0, cv(s2)))))))
  albidv(s2, wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wi(w3a(wcel(cv(s0), cdm(cdm(cv(hs0)))), wcel(cv(s1), cdm(cdm(cv(hs0)))), wcel(cv(s2), cdm(cdm(cv(hs0))))), wceq(co(co(cv(s0), cv(hs0), cv(s1)), cv(hs0), cv(s2)), co(cv(s0), cv(hs0), co(cv(s1), cv(hs0), cv(s2))))), wi(w3a(wcel(cv(s0), cdm(cdm(c0))), wcel(cv(s1), cdm(cdm(c0))), wcel(cv(s2), cdm(cdm(c0)))), wceq(co(co(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)), c0, cv(s2)), co(cv(s0), c0, co(cv(s1), c0, cv(s2))))))
  imbi12d(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), w3a(wcel(cv(s0), cdm(cdm(cv(hs0)))), wcel(cv(s1), cdm(cdm(cv(hs0)))), wcel(cv(s2), cdm(cdm(cv(hs0))))), wceq(co(co(cv(s0), cv(hs0), cv(s1)), cv(hs0), cv(s2)), co(cv(s0), cv(hs0), co(cv(s1), cv(hs0), cv(s2)))), w3a(wcel(cv(s0), cdm(cdm(c0))), wcel(cv(s1), cdm(cdm(c0))), wcel(cv(s2), cdm(cdm(c0)))), wceq(co(co(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)), c0, cv(s2)), co(cv(s0), c0, co(cv(s1), c0, cv(s2)))))
  3anbi123d(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(cv(s0), cdm(cdm(cv(hs0)))), wcel(cv(s1), cdm(cdm(cv(hs0)))), wcel(cv(s2), cdm(cdm(cv(hs0)))), wcel(cv(s0), cdm(cdm(c0))), wcel(cv(s1), cdm(cdm(c0))), wcel(cv(s2), cdm(cdm(c0))))
  eleq2d(cv(s0), cdm(cdm(cv(hs0))), cdm(cdm(c0)), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  eleq2d(cv(s1), cdm(cdm(cv(hs0))), cdm(cdm(c0)), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  eleq2d(cv(s2), cdm(cdm(cv(hs0))), cdm(cdm(c0)), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  dmeqd(cdm(cv(hs0)), cdm(c0), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  dmeq(cv(hs0), c0)
  eqeq12d(co(co(cv(s0), cv(hs0), cv(s1)), cv(hs0), cv(s2)), co(cv(s0), cv(hs0), co(cv(s1), cv(hs0), cv(s2))), co(co(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)), c0, cv(s2)), co(cv(s0), c0, co(cv(s1), c0, cv(s2))), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  eqtrd(co(co(cv(s0), cv(hs0), cv(s1)), cv(hs0), cv(s2)), co(co(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)), c0, cv(s2)), co(co(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)), cv(hs0), cv(s2)), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  oveq1d(co(cv(s0), cv(hs0), cv(s1)), cv(hs0), cv(s2), co(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  oveq(cv(hs0), c0, cv(s0), cv(s1))
  oveq(cv(hs0), c0, co(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)), cv(s2))
  eqtrd(co(cv(s0), cv(hs0), co(cv(s1), cv(hs0), cv(s2))), co(cv(s0), c0, co(cv(s1), c0, cv(s2))), co(cv(s0), cv(hs0), co(cv(s1), c0, cv(s2))), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  oveq2d(cv(s0), cv(hs0), co(cv(s1), cv(hs0), cv(s2)), co(cv(s1), c0, cv(s2)), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  oveq(cv(hs0), c0, cv(s1), cv(s2))
  oveq(cv(hs0), c0, cv(s0), co(cv(s1), c0, cv(s2)))
  r3al(s0, s1, s2, cdm(cdm(cv(hs0))), cdm(cdm(cv(hs0))), cdm(cdm(cv(hs0))), wceq(co(co(cv(s0), cv(hs0), cv(s1)), cv(hs0), cv(s2)), co(cv(s0), cv(hs0), co(cv(s1), cv(hs0), cv(s2)))))
  r3al(s0, s1, s2, cdm(cdm(c0)), cdm(cdm(c0)), cdm(cdm(c0)), wceq(co(co(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)), c0, cv(s2)), co(cv(s0), c0, co(cv(s1), c0, cv(s2)))))
  raleqbidv(s0, cdm(cdm(c0)), c2, wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wral(s1, cdm(cdm(c0)), wral(s2, cdm(cdm(c0)), wceq(co(co(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)), c0, cv(s2)), co(cv(s0), c0, co(cv(s1), c0, cv(s2)))))), wral(s1, c2, wral(s2, cdm(cdm(c0)), wceq(co(co(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)), c0, cv(s2)), co(cv(s0), c0, co(cv(s1), c0, cv(s2)))))))
  raleqdv(s1, cdm(cdm(c0)), c2, wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wral(s2, cdm(cdm(c0)), wceq(co(co(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)), c0, cv(s2)), co(cv(s0), c0, co(cv(s1), c0, cv(s2))))))
  2ralbidv(s0, s1, c2, c2, wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wral(s2, cdm(cdm(c0)), wceq(co(co(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)), c0, cv(s2)), co(cv(s0), c0, co(cv(s1), c0, cv(s2))))), wral(s2, c2, wceq(co(co(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)), c0, cv(s2)), co(cv(s0), c0, co(cv(s1), c0, cv(s2))))))
  raleqdv(s2, cdm(cdm(c0)), c2, wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(co(co(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)), c0, cv(s2)), co(cv(s0), c0, co(cv(s1), c0, cv(s2)))))
  a1i(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(cdm(cdm(c0)), c2))
  eqcomi(cdm(cdm(c0)), c2)
  df-ass(hs0, s0, s1, s2)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.w(wral(s0, c2, wral(s1, c2, wral(s2, c2, wceq(co(co(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)), c0, cv(s2)), co(cv(s0), c0, co(cv(s1), c0, cv(s2))))))))
  diff.wceq.s(s0, cv(hs0), c0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.wceq.s(s1, cv(hs0), c0)
  diff.wceq.s(s2, cv(hs0), c0)
  diff.cdm.s(s1, cdm(cv(hs0)))
  diff.cdm.s(s1, cv(hs0))
  diff.cv.s(s1, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.cdm.s(s2, cdm(cv(hs0)))
  diff.cdm.s(s2, cv(hs0))
  diff.cv.s(s2, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s2, hs0)
  diff.cdm.s(s1, cdm(c0))
  diff.cdm.s(s1, c0)
  diff.cdm.s(s2, cdm(c0))
  diff.cdm.s(s2, c0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
  diff.hs0.s(s2)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm isass(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  ⊢ (c0 ∈ c1 →(c0 ∈ Ass ↔ ∀(s0 ∈ c2, ∀(s1 ∈ c2, ∀(s2 ∈ c2,((s0[c0]s1)[c0]s2)=(s0[c0](s1[c0]s2)))))))
  ⊣ c2 = dom(dom(c0))
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, s2)
  ⊣ d(s1, s2)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c2)
  ⊣ d(s1, c0)
  ⊣ d(s1, c2)
  ⊣ d(s2, c0)
  ⊣ d(s2, c2)
} = {
  a1ii((c0 ∈ c1 →(c0 ∈ Ass ↔ ∀(s0 ∈ c2, ∀(s1 ∈ c2, ∀(s2 ∈ c2,((s0[c0]s1)[c0]s2)=(s0[c0](s1[c0]s2))))))), d(s0, c2))
  elab2g(hs0, c0, c1, cass, ∀(s0 ∈ c2, ∀(s1 ∈ c2, ∀(s2 ∈ c2,((s0[c0]s1)[c0]s2)=(s0[c0](s1[c0]s2))))), ∀(s0 ∈ dom(dom(hs0)), ∀(s1 ∈ dom(dom(hs0)), ∀(s2 ∈ dom(dom(hs0)),((s0[hs0]s1)[hs0]s2)=(s0[hs0](s1[hs0]s2))))))
  3bitrd(hs0 = c0, ∀(s0 ∈ dom(dom(hs0)), ∀(s1 ∈ dom(dom(hs0)), ∀(s2 ∈ dom(dom(hs0)),((s0[hs0]s1)[hs0]s2)=(s0[hs0](s1[hs0]s2))))), ∀(s0 ∈ c2, ∀(s1 ∈ c2, ∀(s2 ∈ c2,((s0[c0]s1)[c0]s2)=(s0[c0](s1[c0]s2))))), ∀(s0 ∈ dom(dom(c0)), ∀(s1 ∈ dom(dom(c0)), ∀(s2 ∈ dom(dom(c0)),((s0[c0]s1)[c0]s2)=(s0[c0](s1[c0]s2))))), ∀(s0 ∈ c2, ∀(s1 ∈ c2, ∀(s2 ∈ dom(dom(c0)),((s0[c0]s1)[c0]s2)=(s0[c0](s1[c0]s2))))))
  3bitr4g(hs0 = c0, ∀(s0 ∈ dom(dom(hs0)), ∀(s1 ∈ dom(dom(hs0)), ∀(s2 ∈ dom(dom(hs0)),((s0[hs0]s1)[hs0]s2)=(s0[hs0](s1[hs0]s2))))), ∀(s0 ∈ dom(dom(c0)), ∀(s1 ∈ dom(dom(c0)), ∀(s2 ∈ dom(dom(c0)),((s0[c0]s1)[c0]s2)=(s0[c0](s1[c0]s2))))), ∀(s0, ∀(s1, ∀(s2,((s0 ∈ dom(dom(hs0))∧ s1 ∈ dom(dom(hs0))∧ s2 ∈ dom(dom(hs0)))→((s0[hs0]s1)[hs0]s2)=(s0[hs0](s1[hs0]s2)))))), ∀(s0, ∀(s1, ∀(s2,((s0 ∈ dom(dom(c0))∧ s1 ∈ dom(dom(c0))∧ s2 ∈ dom(dom(c0)))→((s0[c0]s1)[c0]s2)=(s0[c0](s1[c0]s2)))))))
  2albidv(s0, s1, hs0 = c0, ∀(s2,((s0 ∈ dom(dom(hs0))∧ s1 ∈ dom(dom(hs0))∧ s2 ∈ dom(dom(hs0)))→((s0[hs0]s1)[hs0]s2)=(s0[hs0](s1[hs0]s2)))), ∀(s2,((s0 ∈ dom(dom(c0))∧ s1 ∈ dom(dom(c0))∧ s2 ∈ dom(dom(c0)))→((s0[c0]s1)[c0]s2)=(s0[c0](s1[c0]s2)))))
  albidv(s2, hs0 = c0, ((s0 ∈ dom(dom(hs0))∧ s1 ∈ dom(dom(hs0))∧ s2 ∈ dom(dom(hs0)))→((s0[hs0]s1)[hs0]s2)=(s0[hs0](s1[hs0]s2))), ((s0 ∈ dom(dom(c0))∧ s1 ∈ dom(dom(c0))∧ s2 ∈ dom(dom(c0)))→((s0[c0]s1)[c0]s2)=(s0[c0](s1[c0]s2))))
  imbi12d(hs0 = c0, (s0 ∈ dom(dom(hs0))∧ s1 ∈ dom(dom(hs0))∧ s2 ∈ dom(dom(hs0))), ((s0[hs0]s1)[hs0]s2)=(s0[hs0](s1[hs0]s2)), (s0 ∈ dom(dom(c0))∧ s1 ∈ dom(dom(c0))∧ s2 ∈ dom(dom(c0))), ((s0[c0]s1)[c0]s2)=(s0[c0](s1[c0]s2)))
  3anbi123d(hs0 = c0, s0 ∈ dom(dom(hs0)), s1 ∈ dom(dom(hs0)), s2 ∈ dom(dom(hs0)), s0 ∈ dom(dom(c0)), s1 ∈ dom(dom(c0)), s2 ∈ dom(dom(c0)))
  eleq2d(s0, dom(dom(hs0)), dom(dom(c0)), hs0 = c0)
  eleq2d(s1, dom(dom(hs0)), dom(dom(c0)), hs0 = c0)
  eleq2d(s2, dom(dom(hs0)), dom(dom(c0)), hs0 = c0)
  dmeqd(dom(hs0), dom(c0), hs0 = c0)
  dmeq(hs0, c0)
  eqeq12d(((s0[hs0]s1)[hs0]s2), (s0[hs0](s1[hs0]s2)), ((s0[c0]s1)[c0]s2), (s0[c0](s1[c0]s2)), hs0 = c0)
  eqtrd(((s0[hs0]s1)[hs0]s2), ((s0[c0]s1)[c0]s2), ((s0[c0]s1)[hs0]s2), hs0 = c0)
  oveq1d((s0[hs0]s1), hs0, s2, (s0[c0]s1), hs0 = c0)
  oveq(hs0, c0, s0, s1)
  oveq(hs0, c0, (s0[c0]s1), s2)
  eqtrd((s0[hs0](s1[hs0]s2)), (s0[c0](s1[c0]s2)), (s0[hs0](s1[c0]s2)), hs0 = c0)
  oveq2d(s0, hs0, (s1[hs0]s2), (s1[c0]s2), hs0 = c0)
  oveq(hs0, c0, s1, s2)
  oveq(hs0, c0, s0, (s1[c0]s2))
  r3al(s0, s1, s2, dom(dom(hs0)), dom(dom(hs0)), dom(dom(hs0)), ((s0[hs0]s1)[hs0]s2)=(s0[hs0](s1[hs0]s2)))
  r3al(s0, s1, s2, dom(dom(c0)), dom(dom(c0)), dom(dom(c0)), ((s0[c0]s1)[c0]s2)=(s0[c0](s1[c0]s2)))
  raleqbidv(s0, dom(dom(c0)), c2, hs0 = c0, ∀(s1 ∈ dom(dom(c0)), ∀(s2 ∈ dom(dom(c0)),((s0[c0]s1)[c0]s2)=(s0[c0](s1[c0]s2)))), ∀(s1 ∈ c2, ∀(s2 ∈ dom(dom(c0)),((s0[c0]s1)[c0]s2)=(s0[c0](s1[c0]s2)))))
  raleqdv(s1, dom(dom(c0)), c2, hs0 = c0, ∀(s2 ∈ dom(dom(c0)),((s0[c0]s1)[c0]s2)=(s0[c0](s1[c0]s2))))
  2ralbidv(s0, s1, c2, c2, hs0 = c0, ∀(s2 ∈ dom(dom(c0)),((s0[c0]s1)[c0]s2)=(s0[c0](s1[c0]s2))), ∀(s2 ∈ c2,((s0[c0]s1)[c0]s2)=(s0[c0](s1[c0]s2))))
  raleqdv(s2, dom(dom(c0)), c2, hs0 = c0, ((s0[c0]s1)[c0]s2)=(s0[c0](s1[c0]s2)))
  a1i(hs0 = c0, dom(dom(c0))= c2)
  eqcomi(dom(dom(c0)), c2)
  df-ass(hs0, s0, s1, s2)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.w(∀(s0 ∈ c2, ∀(s1 ∈ c2, ∀(s2 ∈ c2,((s0[c0]s1)[c0]s2)=(s0[c0](s1[c0]s2))))))
  diff.wceq.s(s0, hs0, c0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.wceq.s(s1, hs0, c0)
  diff.wceq.s(s2, hs0, c0)
  diff.cdm.s(s1, dom(hs0))
  diff.cdm.s(s1, hs0)
  diff.cv.s(s1, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.cdm.s(s2, dom(hs0))
  diff.cdm.s(s2, hs0)
  diff.cv.s(s2, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s2, hs0)
  diff.cdm.s(s1, dom(c0))
  diff.cdm.s(s1, c0)
  diff.cdm.s(s2, dom(c0))
  diff.cdm.s(s2, c0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
  diff.hs0.s(s2)
}

blocks.name: isexid
blocks.content: The predicate ` G ` has a left and right identity element. (Contributed by FL, 2-Nov-2009.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 22-Dec-2013.) (New usage is discouraged.)
blocks.origin:
thm isexid(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, c1), wb(wcel(c0, cexid), wrex(s0, c2, wral(s1, c2, wa(wceq(co(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)), cv(s1)), wceq(co(cv(s1), c0, cv(s0)), cv(s1)))))))
  -| wceq(c2, cdm(cdm(c0)))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
} = {
  a1ii(wi(wcel(c0, c1), wb(wcel(c0, cexid), wrex(s0, c2, wral(s1, c2, wa(wceq(co(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)), cv(s1)), wceq(co(cv(s1), c0, cv(s0)), cv(s1))))))), diffsc(s0, c2))
  a1ii(wi(wcel(c0, c1), wb(wcel(c0, cexid), wrex(s0, c2, wral(s1, c2, wa(wceq(co(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)), cv(s1)), wceq(co(cv(s1), c0, cv(s0)), cv(s1))))))), diffsc(s1, c2))
  elab2g(hs0, c0, c1, cexid, wrex(s0, c2, wral(s1, c2, wa(wceq(co(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)), cv(s1)), wceq(co(cv(s1), c0, cv(s0)), cv(s1))))), wrex(s0, cdm(cdm(cv(hs0))), wral(s1, cdm(cdm(cv(hs0))), wa(wceq(co(cv(s0), cv(hs0), cv(s1)), cv(s1)), wceq(co(cv(s1), cv(hs0), cv(s0)), cv(s1))))))
  rexeqbidv(s0, cdm(cdm(cv(hs0))), c2, wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wral(s1, cdm(cdm(cv(hs0))), wa(wceq(co(cv(s0), cv(hs0), cv(s1)), cv(s1)), wceq(co(cv(s1), cv(hs0), cv(s0)), cv(s1)))), wral(s1, c2, wa(wceq(co(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)), cv(s1)), wceq(co(cv(s1), c0, cv(s0)), cv(s1)))))
  raleqbidv(s1, cdm(cdm(cv(hs0))), c2, wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wa(wceq(co(cv(s0), cv(hs0), cv(s1)), cv(s1)), wceq(co(cv(s1), cv(hs0), cv(s0)), cv(s1))), wa(wceq(co(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)), cv(s1)), wceq(co(cv(s1), c0, cv(s0)), cv(s1))))
  syl6eqr(cdm(cdm(cv(hs0))), c2, cdm(cdm(c0)), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  dmeqd(cdm(cv(hs0)), cdm(c0), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  dmeq(cv(hs0), c0)
  anbi12d(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(co(cv(s0), cv(hs0), cv(s1)), cv(s1)), wceq(co(cv(s1), cv(hs0), cv(s0)), cv(s1)), wceq(co(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)), cv(s1)), wceq(co(cv(s1), c0, cv(s0)), cv(s1)))
  eqeq1d(co(cv(s0), cv(hs0), cv(s1)), cv(s1), co(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  oveq(cv(hs0), c0, cv(s0), cv(s1))
  eqeq1d(co(cv(s1), cv(hs0), cv(s0)), cv(s1), co(cv(s1), c0, cv(s0)), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  oveq(cv(hs0), c0, cv(s1), cv(s0))
  df-exid(hs0, s0, s1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.w(wrex(s0, c2, wral(s1, c2, wa(wceq(co(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)), cv(s1)), wceq(co(cv(s1), c0, cv(s0)), cv(s1))))))
  diff.wceq.s(s0, cv(hs0), c0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.wceq.s(s1, cv(hs0), c0)
  diff.cv.s(s1, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm isexid(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  ⊢ (c0 ∈ c1 →(c0 ∈ ExId ↔ ∃(s0 ∈ c2, ∀(s1 ∈ c2,((s0[c0]s1)= s1 ∧(s1[c0]s0)= s1)))))
  ⊣ c2 = dom(dom(c0))
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c2)
  ⊣ d(s1, c0)
  ⊣ d(s1, c2)
} = {
  a1ii((c0 ∈ c1 →(c0 ∈ ExId ↔ ∃(s0 ∈ c2, ∀(s1 ∈ c2,((s0[c0]s1)= s1 ∧(s1[c0]s0)= s1))))), d(s0, c2))
  a1ii((c0 ∈ c1 →(c0 ∈ ExId ↔ ∃(s0 ∈ c2, ∀(s1 ∈ c2,((s0[c0]s1)= s1 ∧(s1[c0]s0)= s1))))), d(s1, c2))
  elab2g(hs0, c0, c1, cexid, ∃(s0 ∈ c2, ∀(s1 ∈ c2,((s0[c0]s1)= s1 ∧(s1[c0]s0)= s1))), ∃(s0 ∈ dom(dom(hs0)), ∀(s1 ∈ dom(dom(hs0)),((s0[hs0]s1)= s1 ∧(s1[hs0]s0)= s1))))
  rexeqbidv(s0, dom(dom(hs0)), c2, hs0 = c0, ∀(s1 ∈ dom(dom(hs0)),((s0[hs0]s1)= s1 ∧(s1[hs0]s0)= s1)), ∀(s1 ∈ c2,((s0[c0]s1)= s1 ∧(s1[c0]s0)= s1)))
  raleqbidv(s1, dom(dom(hs0)), c2, hs0 = c0, ((s0[hs0]s1)= s1 ∧(s1[hs0]s0)= s1), ((s0[c0]s1)= s1 ∧(s1[c0]s0)= s1))
  syl6eqr(dom(dom(hs0)), c2, dom(dom(c0)), hs0 = c0)
  dmeqd(dom(hs0), dom(c0), hs0 = c0)
  dmeq(hs0, c0)
  anbi12d(hs0 = c0, (s0[hs0]s1)= s1, (s1[hs0]s0)= s1, (s0[c0]s1)= s1, (s1[c0]s0)= s1)
  eqeq1d((s0[hs0]s1), s1, (s0[c0]s1), hs0 = c0)
  oveq(hs0, c0, s0, s1)
  eqeq1d((s1[hs0]s0), s1, (s1[c0]s0), hs0 = c0)
  oveq(hs0, c0, s1, s0)
  df-exid(hs0, s0, s1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.w(∃(s0 ∈ c2, ∀(s1 ∈ c2,((s0[c0]s1)= s1 ∧(s1[c0]s0)= s1))))
  diff.wceq.s(s0, hs0, c0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.wceq.s(s1, hs0, c0)
  diff.cv.s(s1, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
}
